014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.internal;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Type;
017import java.sql.ResultSet;
018import java.sql.SQLException;
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.Comparator;
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.Map;
023import java.util.Optional;
024import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
025
026import org.jdbi.v3.core.annotation.Unmappable;
027import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
028import org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericTypes;
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Unchecked;
030import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.ColumnMapper;
031import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.Nested;
032import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.NoSuchMapperException;
033import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.PropagateNull;
034import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.RowMapper;
035import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.SingleColumnMapper;
036import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.ColumnName;
037import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.ColumnNameMatcher;
038import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.ReflectionMappers;
039import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.internal.PojoProperties.PojoBuilder;
040import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.internal.PojoProperties.PojoProperty;
041import org.jdbi.v3.core.result.UnableToProduceResultException;
042import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
043
044import static org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.ReflectionMapperUtil.anyColumnsStartWithPrefix;
045import static org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.ReflectionMapperUtil.findColumnIndex;
046import static org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.reflect.ReflectionMapperUtil.getColumnNames;
047
048/** This class is the future home of BeanMapper functionality. */
049public class PojoMapper<T> implements RowMapper<T> {
050
051    protected boolean strictColumnTypeMapping = true; // this should be default (only?) behavior but that's a breaking change
052    protected final Type type;
053    protected final String prefix;
054    private final Map<PojoProperty<T>, PojoMapper<?>> nestedMappers = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
055
056    public PojoMapper(Type type, String prefix) {
057        this.type = type;
058        this.prefix = prefix.toLowerCase();
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public T map(ResultSet rs, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
063        return specialize(rs, ctx).map(rs, ctx);
064    }
065
066    @Override
067    public RowMapper<T> specialize(ResultSet rs, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
068        final List<String> columnNames = getColumnNames(rs);
069        final List<ColumnNameMatcher> columnNameMatchers =
070                ctx.getConfig(ReflectionMappers.class).getColumnNameMatchers();
071        final List<String> unmatchedColumns = new ArrayList<>(columnNames);
072
073        RowMapper<T> result = specialize0(ctx, columnNames, columnNameMatchers, unmatchedColumns)
074            .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Mapping bean %s didn't find any matching columns in result set", type)));
075
076        if (ctx.getConfig(ReflectionMappers.class).isStrictMatching()
077            && anyColumnsStartWithPrefix(unmatchedColumns, prefix, columnNameMatchers)) {
078
079            throw new IllegalArgumentException(
080                String.format("Mapping bean %s could not match properties for columns: %s", type, unmatchedColumns));
081        }
082
083        return result;
084    }
085
086    private Optional<RowMapper<T>> specialize0(StatementContext ctx,
087                                               List<String> columnNames,
088                                               List<ColumnNameMatcher> columnNameMatchers,
089                                               List<String> unmatchedColumns) {
090        final List<PropertyData<T>> propList = new ArrayList<>();
091
092        for (PojoProperty<T> property : getProperties(ctx.getConfig()).getProperties().values()) {
093            Nested anno = property.getAnnotation(Nested.class).orElse(null);
094            if (property.getAnnotation(Unmappable.class).map(Unmappable::value).orElse(false)) {
095                continue;
096            }
097
098            if (anno == null) {
099                String paramName = prefix + getName(property);
100
101                findColumnIndex(paramName, columnNames, columnNameMatchers, () -> debugName(property))
102                    .ifPresent(index -> {
103                        @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
104                        ColumnMapper<?> mapper = ctx.findColumnMapperFor(property.getQualifiedType().mapType(GenericTypes::box))
105                            .orElseGet(() -> (ColumnMapper) defaultColumnMapper(property));
106
107                        propList.add(new PropertyData<>(property, new SingleColumnMapper<>(mapper, index + 1)));
108                        unmatchedColumns.remove(columnNames.get(index));
109                    });
110            } else {
111                String nestedPrefix = prefix + anno.value();
112                if (anyColumnsStartWithPrefix(columnNames, nestedPrefix, columnNameMatchers)) {
113                    nestedMappers
114                        .computeIfAbsent(property, d -> createNestedMapper(ctx, d, nestedPrefix))
115                        .specialize0(ctx, columnNames, columnNameMatchers, unmatchedColumns)
116                        .ifPresent(nestedMapper ->
117                            propList.add(new PropertyData<>(property, nestedMapper)));
118                }
119            }
120        }
121
122        if (propList.isEmpty() && !columnNames.isEmpty()) {
123            return Optional.empty();
124        }
125        propList.sort(Comparator.comparing(p -> p.propagateNull ? 1 : 0));
126
127        final Optional<String> nullMarkerColumn =
128                Optional.ofNullable(GenericTypes.getErasedType(type).getAnnotation(PropagateNull.class))
129                    .map(PropagateNull::value);
130        return Optional.of((r, c) -> {
131            if (propagateNull(r, nullMarkerColumn)) {
132                return null;
133            }
134            final PojoBuilder<T> pojo = getProperties(c.getConfig()).create();
135
136            for (PropertyData<T> p : propList) {
137                Object value = p.mapper.map(r, ctx);
138                if (p.propagateNull && (value == null || (p.isPrimitive && r.wasNull()))) {
139                    return null;
140                }
141
142                if (value != null) {
143                    pojo.set(p.property, value);
144                }
145            }
146
147            return pojo.build();
148        });
149    }
150
151    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
152    protected PojoProperties<T> getProperties(ConfigRegistry config) {
153        return (PojoProperties<T>) config.get(PojoTypes.class).findFor(type)
154                .orElseThrow(() -> new UnableToProduceResultException("Couldn't find properties for " + type));
155    }
156
157    @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") // Type loses <T>
158    protected PojoMapper<?> createNestedMapper(StatementContext ctx, PojoProperty<T> property, String nestedPrefix) {
159        final Type propertyType = property.getQualifiedType().getType();
160        return new PojoMapper(
161                GenericTypes.getErasedType(propertyType),
162                nestedPrefix);
163    }
164
165    public static boolean propagateNull(ResultSet r, Optional<String> nullMarkerColumn) {
166        return nullMarkerColumn.map(
167                Unchecked.function(col -> {
168                    r.getObject(col);
169                    return r.wasNull();
170                }))
171            .orElse(false);
172    }
173
174    private ColumnMapper<?> defaultColumnMapper(PojoProperty<T> property) {
175        if (strictColumnTypeMapping) {
176            throw new NoSuchMapperException(String.format(
177                    "Couldn't find mapper for property '%s' of type '%s' from %s", property.getName(), property.getQualifiedType(), type));
178        }
179        return (r, n, c) -> r.getObject(n);
180    }
181
182    private String getName(PojoProperty<T> property) {
183        return property.getAnnotation(ColumnName.class)
184                .map(ColumnName::value)
185                .orElseGet(property::getName);
186    }
187
188    private String debugName(PojoProperty<T> p) {
189        return String.format("%s.%s", type, p.getName());
190    }
191
192    private static class PropertyData<T> {
193        PropertyData(PojoProperty<T> property, RowMapper<?> mapper) {
194            this.property = property;
195            this.mapper = mapper;
196            propagateNull = property.getAnnotation(PropagateNull.class).isPresent();
197            isPrimitive = GenericTypes.getErasedType(property.getQualifiedType().getType()).isPrimitive();
198        }
199        final PojoProperty<T> property;
200        final RowMapper<?> mapper;
201        final boolean propagateNull;
202        final boolean isPrimitive;
203    }
204}
